title: [Forging Ahead, Workshop]
description: Stacks of heavy metal slabs are scattered around the dust-filled workshop.  A long iron workbench piled with pieces of unfinished weapons spans the wall across from the mithril-banded door.  Hastily strewn across the floor are some cushions, disrupting the thick layer of soot that otherwise uniformly covers the ground.
